Package admin

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
admin.AdminController
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
The AdminController contains all the event listener methods of the Admin System UI page. There are some buttons on this page, and when the buttons get clicked, then the matching UI page will pop up.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Lai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AdminController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteLibrarian​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The deleteLibrarian() method shows the Delete Librarian UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.
    void initAccount​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]> account)
    initAccount method is used to initialize the account data after the user logins.
    void logoutFn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The logoutFn() method closes the UI page when user click on the Logout button and returns the user to the Login page when the button is clicked.
    void registerLibrarian​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The registerLibrarian() method shows the Register Librarian UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.
    void viewAllLibrarians​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The viewAllLibrarians() method shows the View All Librarians UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminController

      public AdminController()

  • Method Details

    • initAccount

      public void initAccount​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]> account)
      initAccount method is used to initialize the account data after the user logins. This data is then displayed on the page.
      Parameters:
      account - An ArrayList of Object arrays which stores the user's account information collected from the database.

    • logoutFn

      public void logoutFn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The logoutFn() method closes the UI page when user click on the Logout button and returns the user to the Login page when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent object that listening the button. When the button is clicked, this method will be called.

    • registerLibrarian

      public void registerLibrarian​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The registerLibrarian() method shows the Register Librarian UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent object that listening the button. When the button is clicked, this method will be called.

    • deleteLibrarian

      public void deleteLibrarian​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The deleteLibrarian() method shows the Delete Librarian UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent object that listening the button. When the button is clicked, this method will be called.

    • viewAllLibrarians

      public void viewAllLibrarians​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The viewAllLibrarians() method shows the View All Librarians UI page when user click on it the corresponding button.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent object that listening the button. When the button is clicked, this method will be called.
